org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.tez

Class WmPoolMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.tez.WmPoolMetrics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.MetricsSource

    public class WmPoolMetrics
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.MetricsSource
    A wrapper for metrics for single WM pool. This outputs metrics both to Codahale and standard Hadoop metrics, in parallel. The codahale output is prefixed with pool name and is mostly for the JMX view, or to look at when Hadoop metrics are not set up. Hadoop metrics are output because they can be tagged properly rather than prefixed, so they are better for dashboards.
